memberdef.name: FOTA_URIPATH_OBJECT_INDEX
memberdef.initializer: (UINT8_C(2)) /* Object Index Value Represents the Index value of DeviceResource Inofrmation Structure while connecting to server */

memberdef.name: FOTA_URIPATH_OBJECT_INSTANCE
memberdef.initializer: (UINT8_C(2)) /* Object Instance Instance is used to notify the fota object information */

briefdescription.para: This module will handle, FOTA related activities like FOTA resources State change, firmware storage and etc.
